select max(modifieddate) as LastDate from saleslt.customer

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from saleslt.customer where modifieddate > '@{activity('Lookup1').output.firstRow.rundate}' and modifieddate <= '@{activity('Lookup2').output.firstRow.LastDate}'
